detailsSection: This PowerPoint deck contains a placeholder to summarize the BDM and TDM discussions to date, introduces the IO model and the solution phases, and proposes an approach to customize and design the solution. This PowerPoint deck is used as the presentation for  the Solution Implementation team kickoff meeting. The TDM Conversation Sheet can be used along with this PowerPoint deck to provide a handy reference of the BDM’s and TDM’s priorities and how they relate to the solution IO mappings.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
